short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opt out of Google's interest-based ads as you browse the web with Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension opts you out of the DoubleClick advertising cookie, which Google uses to show you interest-based ads on partnering websites.

- Stops interest-based ads on some of the websites that partner with Google 
- One-time install on Chrome
- Opt out remains in effect, even after you clear your browserâ€™s cookies

For developers
IBA Opt out extension by Google is available as open source at https://github.com/google/iba-opt-out-plugin

Terms of Service
By using IBA Opt out, you agree to the Terms of Service at https://chrome.google.com/extensions/intl/en/gallery_tos.html
